creator: rsneale@verisign.com

text:
-d does not necessarily map to dest.

For me dest is where I want to check out the files to (instead of the project's
basedir), and this is what the current task does.

We could add another attribute for the -d switch, any idea how we'd call it?
creator: bodewig@apache.org
conor@apache.org
text:
This can be done as shownb in this example

<cvs dest="temp" command="co -d blah jakarta-lucene"/>

I don't think there is a need for additional attributes
